title: Ontime Payments
description: Senior Software Engineer on a payments platform built with serverless architecture on AWS. Working across the full stack with .NET/C# services, NoSQL databases, and modern cloud infrastructure.

title: Maxwell Mysteries
description: A duo of puzzle games where players solve puzzles to find the clues and unravel the mystery. Built during Covid to bring the joy of escape rooms home. You can purchase the full games from Paradox Parlours and take a look at the demo linked here.

title: Director's Portfolio
description: A sleek portfolio site for an award winning theatre director, with a clean visual layout and admin CMS.

title: Trekking Guide's Website
description: A simple portfolio site for a trekking guide in Nepal. Raju wanted to develop an online presence to take his business card digital and provide an easier way for international clients to find his services.

title: Actor's Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio site for an actor, featuring headshots, showreels, and performance credits.
